title: New: Youth Lagoon – Dropla
body:
Two years on from the understated first appearance of **Youth Lagoon** (a solitary track uploaded to a fairly inconspicuous Soundcloud page), it’s pretty incredible just how far the Boise songwriter has come.

With his fanbase building at an ever increasing rate, and having just been announced a support for a highly anticipated **The National** show, **Trevor Powers** has unveiled **Dropla**, the first track to be taken from his upcoming sophomore album. It’s a musical change for Youth Lagoon, in that it’s (correct me if I’m wrong) the first time his studio material has featured a drummer as opposed to a drum-machine. With the distinctive almost weeping vocals of Powers and the refined, euphoric riffs that we’re used to from him, it’s a welcome return, in what is set to be a huge year for Youth Lagoon.

Dropla is taken from Wondrous Bughouse, out 5 March via Fat Possum. Check out tour dates below.

02-25 Spokane, WA – A Club  
02-26 Missoula, MT – Badlander  
02-27 Bozeman, MT – Filling Station  
02-28 Salt Lake City, UT – Kilby Court  
03-01 Denver, CO – Larimer Lounge  
03-21-24 Boise, ID – Treefort Music Fest  
06-05 Brooklyn, NY – Barclays Center \*  
\* with The National
